channel.title: Seroius help required! How to anti-lag pimpscape?
channel.description:
hi im making a awesome server gonna advertise it soon but ive noticed that there is alot of lag on it as it is a pk server i didnt expect it to be soo laggy anyhow i wanna know if there is any way to get rid of this? And plz i know that pimpscape is a lag source but i wish i knew that earlyer I could use some seroius help from you guys thnx! Or is there anyway i could transfer the client.java file and the files i modified to another source or something?? thnx! all
NOTE: Problem solver will become player mod on my server once its up!

item.title: Seroius help required! How to anti-lag pimpscape?
item.dc:creator: @guthan38 guthan38
item.description:
@guthan38 wrote:

If you are playing on your own server, chances are your part will be laggy but not so much for other people. See it takes more cpu usage when you play on your own server. Other chance is you have a crappy coded server

Read full topic

Error: no 'server' JVM at 'c:/program files/java.jre1.6.0/bin/server/jvm.dll.[br][size=1]Posted on: December 26, 2006, 11:21:33 PM[/size][hr]ummh well do any of u guys have a lag free pk source or do u think its just because i have got the VM thing

@echo off title pimpscape java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
